titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit contributions by nonparty multicandidate political committees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 10/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit contributions by nonparty multicandidate political committees (PACs) to a candidate in a Federal election.
